definitions.definition: Any of the order Monotremata of mammals that lay eggs and have single orifices for urogenital and digestive functions ( cloaca ); an echidna , platypus or one of their extinct relatives.

main_definition: ( zoology ) Any of the order Monotremata of mammals that lay eggs and have single orifices for urogenital and digestive functions ( cloaca ); an echidna , platypus or one of their extinct relatives.
